import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add Custom Playlist Cover Image"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/playlists/{{Playlist_Id}}/images"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Replace the image used to represent a specific playlist.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **ugc-image-upload**, **playlist-modify-public**, **playlist-modify-private**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Playlist_Id","description":"The Spotify ID of the playlist.","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"text/plain":{"examples":{"Add Custom Playlist Cover Image":{"value":""}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
